root: ^I think we may be at the station soon, hard to tell from in here.
^Wonderful, I’m finding this train quite stifling. Though I cannot remember how long I’ve been on it.
^I cannot remember much these days, it’s hard to hold on to the days.
^It’s freeing in a way, to leave everything that I once was behind.
^I cannot miss it or fear it or even have any sort of attachment to it.
^I simply am as I am now.
^Not having hang-ups about your past that is…
^It is, though I would perhaps say that getting to the point where your whole world is on fire to achieve it is perhaps not worth it.
^I’m sure there are some things I may miss, but I cannot even conjure a thought of them anymore.
^Yeah, I’m sure there are other ways to let go and move on.
^How did that happen, if I may ask?
^I could not tell you even if I wanted to.
^I don’t know if I’ve been like this for days, months, or years. Things blur to a slow dripping pace when you are engulfed.
^It is what it is now, I move slower, I cannot remember where I am going or where I have been, but I do enjoy the travel. The scenery.
^Even if I had to take unconventional routes.
^I think I may travel to a festival. Perhaps time will catch up with me for the duration of it.
^Since they always move faster and slower than you anticipate.
^A festival sounds nice! There are going to be some in the city in the upcoming weekends.
^Yes, I think that’s where I shall go next.
